body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Richardson Automotive. My name is Justin Richardson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Joan Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joan. To assist you further, may I ask for your phone number and email address for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one zero, and my email is joansanders@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joan, I have noted your phone number and email address. Can you also provide me with your home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is one two three Main Street, Anytown, ABC 10001.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Joan. We take security seriously. Is there anything else you'd like to address about your concern?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated about the security measures at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Joan. Your feedback is important to us. Thank you for sharing your concerns. Is there anything else you would like us to assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Joan. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
